page.title: 06The Market
page.content: Beccles has had a market since the first Domesday Book.Indeed it probably existed since Beccles was founded. The present market is situated in the appropriately named New Market.The original market was held in what is now known as Old Market.This is the site of the Bus Station. The market is held every Friday and there are about a dozen stalls selling mostly fruit and vegetables.There are some clothes stalls.It lasts all day and is a popular local shopping feature.Getting there early in the day usually means getting the best produce. A new open air market operates at Ellough on Sunday amid much controversy.
